languages.text: "Сокрушив проклятых ксеносов, вы искупили свои грехи перед Императором — отправляйтесь к челноку. Остальные же подлежат выборочной дисциплинарной сервиторизации, чтобы и дальше трудиться во благо Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Сокрушив проклятых ксеносов, вы искупили свои грехи перед Императором — отправляйтесь к челноку. Остальные же подлежат выборочной дисциплинарной сервиторизации, чтобы и дальше трудиться во благо Империума".

languages.text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Сокрушив проклятых ксеносов, вы искупили свои грехи перед Императором — отправляйтесь к челноку. Остальные же подлежат выборочной дисциплинарной сервиторизации, чтобы и дальше трудиться во благо Империума".

traits.locale_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

"By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

"By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

"By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

languages.text: “你们消灭了这些邪恶的异形，这已经足够赎清你们对帝皇犯下的罪行，快去穿梭机上吧。至于剩下的人，你们可以自行选择被改造为机仆。这样一来，你们便可以进一步为帝国的利益而勤劳工作。”
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “你们消灭了这些邪恶的异形，这已经足够赎清你们对帝皇犯下的罪行，快去穿梭机上吧。至于剩下的人，你们可以自行选择被改造为奴工。这样一来，你们便可以进一步为帝国的利益而勤劳工作。”

languages.text: «Al destruir a estos inmundos xenos habéis expiado vuestras transgresiones contra el Emperador. Id a la lanzadera. El resto seréis sometidos a conversión punitiva en servidores para que sigáis trabajando para bien del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Al destruir a estos inmundos xenos habéis expiado vuestras transgresiones contra el Emperador. Id a la lanzadera. El resto seréis sometidos a conversión punitiva en servidores para que sigáis trabajando para bien del Imperium».

languages.text: 「悪しき異種族を葬ることで、皇帝への罪を償うことになる…シャトルに乗り込め。残りの者達は、懲罰的なサーヴィター化の対象になるから、さらに帝国のために身を粉にして働けるぞ」
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「悪しき異種族を葬ることで、皇帝への罪を償うことになる…シャトルに乗り込め。残りの者達は、懲罰的なサーヴィター化の対象になるから、さらに帝国のために身を粉にして働けるぞ」

languages.text: "Durch die Vernichtung dieser üblen Xenos habt Ihr für Eure Verfehlungen gegen den Imperator gebüßt – begebt Euch zum Shuttle. Den Rest vor Euch erwartet eine ausgewählte Strafservitorisierung, auf dass Ihr weiterhin für das Wohl des Imperiums arbeitet."
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Durch die Vernichtung dieser üblen Xenos habt Ihr für Eure Verfehlungen gegen den Imperator gebüßt – begebt Euch zum Shuttle. Den Rest vor Euch erwartet eine ausgewählte Strafservitorisierung, auf dass Ihr weiterhin für das Wohl des Imperiums arbeitet."

languages.text: « En anéantissant ces infâmes xénos, vous avez expié vos fautes auprès de l'Empereur. Rejoignez la navette. Quant aux autres, vous serez soumis à une procédure de servitorisation punitive afin que vous puissiez continuer à œuvrer pour le bien de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « En anéantissant ces infâmes xénos, vous avez expié vos fautes auprès de l'Empereur. Rejoignez la navette. Quant aux autres, vous serez soumis à une procédure de servitorisation punitive afin que vous puissiez continuer à œuvrer pour le bien de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Bu alçak zenoları yok ederek İmparator'a karşı işlediğiniz suçların kefaretini ödemiş oldunuz, mekiğe binin. Geri kalanınız arasından seçim yapılacak ve seçilenler hizmetörleştirme cezası alarak İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için daha fazla çaba sarf edebilecekler."
languages.original_text: "By destroying these foul xenos, you have atoned for your transgressions against the Emperor — get to the shuttle. The rest of you will be subject to selective punitive servitorisation so that you may further toil for the good of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Bu alçak zenoları yok ederek İmparator'a karşı işlediğiniz suçların kefaretini ödemiş oldunuz, mekiğe binin. Geri kalanınız arasından seçim yapılacak ve seçilenler servitörleştirme cezası alarak İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için daha fazla çaba sarf edebilecekler."
